name: UnitConcentrationMass
desc: A unit of measure for concentration of mass.

items.name: class var gramsPerLiter: UnitConcentrationMass
items.desc: The grams per liter unit of concentration.

items.name: class var milligramsPerDeciliter: UnitConcentrationMass
items.desc: The milligrams per deciliter unit of concentration.

items.name: class func millimolesPerLiter(withGramsPerMole: Double) -> UnitConcentrationMass
items.desc: Returns the millimoles per liter unit with the specified number of grams per mole.
